content.text: I'm a gold medalist olympian. I love Italian food and garlic bread. My favorite sport is gymnastics and I workout 4 hours a day.
I'm a famous twitch streamer. I helped design the game Starcraft. I'm a recluse and have an allergy to water. I'm working on building a robot to be my body double.
That's really cool that you're a twitch streamer. I've never been able to get into it myself.
Thanks. It's a lot of fun, but it can be a lot of work too.
I can imagine. I'm sure it's a lot of pressure to be entertaining all the time.
Yeah, it can be. But it's also really rewarding when you get to interact with your fans and make them laugh.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you enjoy it.
What's it like to be a recluse? I've always been a bit of an introvert myself, but I don't think I could go full recluse.
It's not always easy. I can get lonely sometimes, but it's also really peaceful. I like being able to control my environment and not have to deal with people all the time.
I can see how that would be appealing. I do like my alone time, but I also like being around people sometimes.
Yeah, I get that. I do like to go out and do things sometimes, but it's usually with a small group of friends or family.
I guess it's all about finding a balance that works for you.
Well, it was nice talking to you.
